sentences.english: The great man Abraham Lincoln was once a poor boy with little education.
sentences.chinese: 伟人林肯就曾经是个受教育不多的穷孩子。

sentences.english: Some great man said money is the source of all money.
sentences.chinese: 某个伟人说过金钱是万恶之源。

sentences.english: History abounds with great men worthy of adulation and emulation.
sentences.chinese: 历史上有很多值得称赞和效法的伟人。

sentences.english: A great man does not care about trifles.
National flags were lowered to half-mast in memory of this great man.
sentences.chinese: 国旗下半旗以纪念这位伟人。

sentences.english: Whether he is a great man, only history will tell.
sentences.chinese: 他算不算得上是个伟人，只能由历史来作出回答。

sentences.english: It is in the darker areas of science that great men win recognition.
sentences.chinese: 伟人在那些希望较为暗淡的科学领域里赢得声誉。

sentences.english: Mean men admire wealth; great men, glory.
sentences.chinese: 庸人爱财富，伟人爱荣誉。

sentences.english: We live in a great world full of miracles and wonderful people.
sentences.chinese: 我们生活的这个奇妙的世界里有许多天才和伟人。

sentences.english: Many great men have arisen from humble beginnings.
The model of the great man stimulates vainer natures to imitate him outwardly or to surpass him;
sentences.chinese: 伟人的榜样激起天性虚荣的人们作表面的模仿或竞赛。

sentences.english: Snowman, Willow, trolls and the seven dwarfs.
sentences.chinese: 还有雪人，柳精，伟人和七个小矮人。

sentences.english: To this type belong many lunatics and most of the great men of history.
sentences.chinese: 很多疯子和大多数历史上的伟人都属于这一类型。

sentences.english: The great man's name will be ever new in the history.
sentences.chinese: 伟人的名字在历史将万古长青。

sentences.english: He lived in the smiles of fortune and basked in the favor of the great .
sentences.chinese: 他生活在幸运的微笑之中，承受着伟人的恩泽。

sentences.english: It is also the great knowledge which enables Lenin to be a great man.
sentences.chinese: 这是他的小习惯，也是他成为伟人的大学问。

definition: huge/great/grand/worthy of the greatest admiration/important (contribution etc)
father or founder of a nation/Father of the Republic (Sun Yat-sen)
(of one's name, reputation etc) to be immortalized (idiom)/to leave a mark for generations to come
